full_summary:
# Request for Proposal
## Request for Proposal Title
Processing of Paper Traveler Contact Information Forms

## Request for Information Entry
^{a standardized call for tender entry template must be completed(Form  PA-TBF-71864)}
 
### Contracting Entity Details
 
| Contracting Entity Name              | Government of Canada, via the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)      　　　　　　　　|
|----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------- 　　　　　　　　　　　|
| Address                                | Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9, Canada                    　　|
 

### Terms and Conditions

### Request for Proposal Overview

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a Request For Proposal (RFP) services for the processing of paper traveler contact information forms.

Key objectives of this contract:

1. To support the receipt, processing, storage, and tracking of traveler information from international airports in Canada.
2. To update Traveler Contact Information Forms (TCIF) with all required details required for justification of declaration for COVID etiquëtes
3. To maintain confidentiality, integrity, and security of handled data
